channel.title: hiking on Lambda Land
channel.description: Recent content in hiking on Lambda Land

item.title: Hike up Desolation Trail
item.description: I hiked up Desolation Trail with Scott Wiersdorf. It had rained a little bit the night before, so the trail was neither dusty nor muddy—perfect for hiking. Figure 1: Hike overview Lots of pretty plants on the way. Figure 2: This flower is called Arrow Leaf Figure 3: Some pretty ground cover Figure 4: A neat old tree that got split The way up was nice and scenic. Figure 5: View from the trail looking at Church Fork or Grandeur Peak—I forget which
